# Setup


```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(paletteer)
```


# Auswahl

```{r}
wesanderson::wes_palette("FantasticFox1")
```




```{r}
show_cols <- function(col_pal){
d <- tibble(x = 1:length(col_pal),
            col = factor(col_pal))

ggplot(d) +
  aes(x=x)+
  geom_bar(aes(fill = col)) +
  theme_void() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = col_pal)
}
```




```{r}
show_cols(paletteer_d("awtools::a_palette", n = 5))
```





```{r}
show_cols(paletteer_d("awtools::mpalette", n = 5))
```

```{r}
show_cols(paletteer_d("ggthemes::colorblind", n = 5))
```
